name: Zero-Tails / Reibi
title: Deity
description: The Zero-Tails (零尾, Reibi) is a man-made tailed beast formed from dark thoughts and the downtrodden. It resembles a large leech with a Noh mask and its power scales with its current chakra/EXP.
naturalAbilities: Variable Power: core stats scale with current chakra/EXP percentage
Bijūvenation: can burn Bijū chakra to recover HP and restore effects/limbs
